description: A shell script for applying database schema and seed data to a MySQL database, ensuring idempotency, configuring database tables, and inserting seed/reference data. It manages database connections, executes SQL statements, and handles errors appropriately.

methods.name: run_sql
methods.description: Executes a given SQL statement using the MySQL command CLI, with error handling.

methods.name: query_scalar
methods.description: Executes a SQL query to fetch a single scalar value (first column of first row).
